Name: Batida de Coco
Ingredients: 60 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.
Review: As the name would suggest this is literally an alcoholic coconut-flavoured shake.
History: Literally meaning a shake of coconut, this is a traditional Brazilian drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Batida de Coco contains 310 calories
